com.commeto.kuleuven.MP.adapters

Class BasePagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentPagerAdapter
        • com.commeto.kuleuven.MP.adapters.BasePagerAdapter

  • public class BasePagerAdapter
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentPagerAdapter
     Created by Jonas on 13/04/2018.

 Adapter used for the fragments in the BaseActivity.

 Fragments:
  - HomeScreenFragment
  - StatsFragment
  - RouteListFragment
  - SettingsFragment
  - GlobalMapFragment
